InductionVitamins_flavor.default: The effect of the vitamins, injected at a distance by induction!

InductionVitamins_desc.default: Gives +150% Max Overheal and +50% Overheal amount.

HypernovaBoots_flavor.default: I've come here to chew gum and run fast... And I'm all out of gum.

HypernovaBoots_desc.default: Gives you a <color=yellow>boost forward</color> at a velocity of <color=yellow>150% of your current velocity</color>.

DivinerCore_flavor.default: The Herald reported unconfirmed sightings of Blight on the surface. - Third Wing, House Beyond

DivinerCore_desc.default: Become Intangible, Speed is locked at 130% of your maximum speed, but lose 15 health per second.
